title: 98 - King of the Badger
description:
I do want to talk about badger stuff.


Credits

Arnie: Arnie Niekamp

Chunt: Adal Rifai

Usidore: Matt Young

Blemish:Martin Wilson

Talbot the Badger: Tugs the Badger

Craig: Ryan DiGiorgi
